hero.name: Hi, I'm Haroldy!!
hero.description: I'm Software Developer, passionate about programming and web development, come and check what I can do..

resume.title: Resume
resume.education_description1: I studied software development at the Technological Institute of the Americas (ITLA), where I was able to obtain the necessary knowledge about technology and development of pages and applications.
resume.education_description2: I took a course on the Udemy virtual platform on web development where I learned HTML CSS and Javascript technologies to be able to work on creating web pages.
resume.education_description3: I took a course on the Cisco Netacad virtual platform where I learned the fundamentals of computers and how they work.
resume.experience_description1: I have done some freelance projects, from websites to mobile applications.
resume.experience_description2: I did an internship at the BHD company where I worked together with agile cells in charge of digital transformation, where I was able to contribute with improvements in the digital system, focused on the user, learning to work under the agile SCRUM methodology.

contact.title: Talk with me!
